setConnected

public void setConnected(boolean isConnected)
                  throws ModelInconsistencyException
Sets the connected state. If isConnected is true, alerts the login window that login has succeeded and it should create a new MainWindow.

Parameters:
isConnected - the new connected state
Throws:
ModelInconsistencyException

addConversation

public TwoWayConversation addConversation(java.lang.String name)
Adds a new two-way conversation with a particular person, if there is no current conversation with that person. If there is an open conversation already, this brings that conversation's window to the front.s

Parameters:
name - The username with with the new conversation will take place.
Returns:

addChatRoom

public ChatRoomConversation addChatRoom(java.lang.String name)
Adds a new chat room conversation with the chat room specified, if the client is not already in that room. If the client is already in the specified room, this brings that conversation's window to the front.

Parameters:
name - The name of the new chat room.

removeTwoWay

Parameters:
convo - The conversation that has been closed.
